desc: Watch the insect life cycle and raise your own caterpillars into butteries from your own home with a butterfly kit. Or give your celebration some extra wings with a live butterfly release for your wedding, memorial, birthday, or other special occasion.

layout.text: Get 25% off With our Summer Sale through July 31!
All Painted Lady cups and kits are 25% through July! Use discount code SUMMER25 to raise and release your own native butterflies! Available while supplies last.
